name: excel-workflow-automator
description: Inspired by u/Jiggles1232's Reddit post "Does anyone else use Python with Excel, Power Query, VBA, and legacy apps at work?" (r/learnpython, 87 upvotes, 71 comments — reddit.com/r/learnpython/comments/1n3mo8p). Describe your repetitive Excel/CSV data workflow in plain English and get a complete, ready-to-run Python automation script. Handles reading, cleaning, transforming, merging, and writing data — with error handling and step-by-step explanation.
